decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Design Statement received on 08/02/2018. Signed statement by Elizabeth Williamson, signed statement by Mr and Mrs Alder dated 22nd April 2018 and signed statement by Ben Cox dated 5th April 2018 received on 09/05/2018. E-1645-A-08B and 2 x receipt for building materials received on 29/05/2018) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the  side walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 4 - The extensions hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes ancillary to the residential use of the dwelling known as 34 Nothumberland Crecent TW14 9SZ.
description: Creation of gable end roof over a two storey side extension, flat roof to corner single storey rear extension, erection of rear patio, 6m in depth and 400mm from existing ground level (average) and installation of additional rear window and rooflight
